title: Kikero Falafel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Fast food, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Middle Eastern
description: Falafel takeout and delivery shop with a few places to sit. Falafel, salads, and sauces are vegan. The toast and desserts contain dairy. Previously located at Sahkulu Mah Galip Dede Cad Yoruk Cikmazi 5, Sep 2014.
streetAddress: Serdar-ı Ekrem Cd No:1, Şahkulu Mh., Beyoğlu
